divs: Sighting DetailsIn agust i was sitting on my front porch talking with my niece.Since i see a lot of strange lights in the sky here i am always looking up.I was watching the stars when poping out from behind the tree i was sitting next to came this dark object.at fist i thought my eyes wree playing tricks but when it went over my little pool the pool reflected off the bottom of this.as it moved slowly toward the woods the field next to my house reflcted off the bottom then the trees too.the onlly way i knew it was there was it blacked out the sky im sure if you viewed it from the top it would have rflected the sky.it was silent and just kinda glideing.You feel free to contact me if you like if there is no answer leave a mewssage.
